author: Nicole Wetsman
title: The search for COVID-19 treatments shows how messy science can be
description: Small studies can’t offer conclusive evidence on how well certain drugs work to treat COVID-19. It takes a buildup of data for multiple sources to understand how well something like hydroxychloroquine does or does not work.
content:
It doesnt look like hydroxychloroquine works, but theres no clear answer yet
Photo by Samir Jana/Hindustan Times via Getty Images
Theres yet another new study out this week on hydroxychloroquine, the anti-malaria drug championed by President Trump (without … [+4616 chars]
